name: WINZORZ_EXP
description:
What is Winzorz_exp?

Winzorz_exp is a free OS pretty useless because it has a zorzware included in the installation, but it has also a super efficient antivirus so it's probably worth it.

I'm joking, it's just a quite funny game that I made in 60 hours.

Features:

- 7 types of annoying fake ads

- 4 types of gameplay (plus a cool tutorial)

- a recycle bin

I don't know if the game in hard mode can be actually finished, let me know.
